statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_value > 100;
SELECT energy_value FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, energy_value FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT MAX(energy_value) AS max_energy_value FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT timestamp, energy_value FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, energy_value FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY energy_value DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_value) AS max_energy_value, MIN(energy_value) AS min_energy_value FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, energy_consumed, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT timestamp, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC
SELECT ec.timestamp, ec.energy_consumed, eo.optimized_energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data ec INNER JOIN energy_optimization eo ON ec.timestamp = eo.timestamp
SELECT ec.timestamp, ec.energy_consumed, eo.optimized_energy_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data ec LEFT JOIN energy_optimization eo ON ec.timestamp = eo.timestamp
SELECT ec.timestamp, SUM(ec.energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ec GROUP BY ec.timestamp ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM energy_devices WHERE manufacturer='ABC Inc.';
SELECT device_name, install_date FROM energy_devices ORDER BY install_date ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM energy_devices WHERE device_type='Smart Meter';
SELECT optimization_id, device_id, optimization_result FROM energy_optimization WHERE optimization_result > 0 ORDER BY optimization_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT device_name, device_type, install_date FROM energy_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'ACME Corp';

SELECT ecd.id, ed.device_name, ecod.optimization_result FROM energy_consumption_data ecd JOIN energy_devices ed ON ecd.id = ed.device_id JOIN energy_optimization ecod ON ed.device_id = ecod.device_id;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT MAX(consumption_amount) FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM energy_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smart Meter';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM energy_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, e.consumption_date, e.consumption_amount FROM customers c JOIN energy_consumption e ON c.customer_id = e.customer_id;
SELECT d.device_name, p.prediction_date, p.predicted_usage FROM energy_devices d JOIN energy_usage_prediction p ON d.device_id = p.device_id ORDER BY predicted_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources;
SELECT building_name, source_type FROM buildings b INNER JOIN energy_sources es ON b.building_id = es.source_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_optimization_results ORDER BY optimization_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT building_name, address FROM buildings
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources

SELECT buildings.building_name, energy_sources.source_name, energy_consumed FROM buildings JOIN building_energy_mapping ON buildings.building_id = building_energy_mapping.building_id JOIN energy_consumption_data ON building_energy_mapping.source_id = energy_consumption_data.id

SELECT buildings.building_name, energy_sources.source_name, energy_optimization_results.optimization_score FROM buildings JOIN building_energy_mapping ON buildings.building_id = building_energy_mapping.building_id JOIN energy_sources ON building_energy_mapping.source_id = energy_sources.source_id JOIN energy_optimization_results ON buildings.building_id = energy_optimization_results.building_id
